a. po. sa u/pela wishaya sandaha nirdeshithashri harshadewayange ‘rathnawali’ natyayapiyadasa nishshankayange pariwarthanayen halalitha sarachchandrage adhyakshanayenme masa 11 wani da (sikurada) pe. wa. 8.00 ta saha 11.00 tamahanuwara hindu sanskruthika madhyasthanayedi wedikagatha we.sanath wimalasiri, prasannajith abesuriya, janaka munasinha,shirani kostha, thihari wikramaaarachchi, ganga paranawithana,surangi kosala, rajitha hewathanthrige, jagath kumara, wijitha wijerathna, somapala pathirage, upamali ranathunga,windhya wimalachandra, lakshani amarathunga,anushika madhumali, chaminda mirihagalla, lakmal pranandu, rawindra ekanayaka, hiran nishada kostha mehi ranganayen dayaka wethi.
bhikshun wahanse sambandhayen atham deshapalanagnyayan nogalapena prakasha nikuth kirima rate sanhindiyawata badhawak wi athayi amathi susil premajayantha mahatha kiya.
